self_predictions.prediction_summary: Jerry feels confident but acknowledges Alex's improvement after seeing him against Georgi. He plans to come in bigger and stronger.

Alex Kurdecha.strength: Improved significantly after the match with Georgi
Alex Kurdecha.previous_match_summary: Lost to Dave Chaffee but came back strong against Georgi

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Jerry thinks Morozov will win due to his absolute power and ability to bounce back stronger after a loss.

Vitalii Laletin.strength: Strong but may not match Morozov's power
Vitalii Laletin.previous_match_summary: Had a close left-arm match with Morozov

Artyom Morozov.strength: Absolute power, especially after a loss
Artyom Morozov.previous_match_summary: Defeated Georgi and had a close left-arm match with Laletin

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Jerry is rooting for Todd but acknowledges Krasimir's strength, especially against John.

Todd Hutchings.previous_match_summary: Lost to Dadikyan but showed strength

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Jerry thinks Irakli has an advantage due to training with Levan and his dominant performances.

Irakli Zirakashvili.previous_match_summary: Strong performances, though has losses to Dadikyan and Ongarbaev

Evgeny Prudnik.strength: Strong but coming back from injury
Evgeny Prudnik.previous_match_summary: Injured after Devon match, returning to competition
